name: SALIX STATE BANK, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF BANKING of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Salix State Bank v. Department of Banking

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: SALIX STATE BANK, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF BANKING of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Commonwealth Court, 50 Pa.Cmwlth. 403, 413 A.2d 23, is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward F. Peduzzi, Myers, Peduzzi, Stratton & Mardula, Ebensburg, for appellant.
John E. Nanorta, Harrisburg, for Dept, of Banking.
casebody.head_matter:
427 A.2d 1154
SALIX STATE BANK, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF BANKING of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 25, 1980.
Filed April 15, 1981.
Edward F. Peduzzi, Myers, Peduzzi, Stratton & Mardula, Ebensburg, for appellant.
John E. Nanorta, Harrisburg, for Dept, of Banking.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
